page.title: 12Watling Way School (cont)
page.content: The clubs that are run are those in which teachers show an interest such as country dancing, chess,recorders and swimming.Clubs are run at lunchtimes and after school.They have discos twice a year.The most popular playground game is elastic and football. In the morning children usually do some mathematics and english work in groups.They also do some reading and writing.There will be some sort of P.E or games during the day and some project or topic work. The people who run the swimming pool clean the pool out regularly.The pool is 10 metres across 15-20 metres in length and 0.90 metres depth in the shallow end and 1.40 metres depth in the deep end.All the children who can not swim go regularly.
